user.title: Uber Ride Tracker Setup
user.description:
To set up Uber Ride Tracker, you'll need to:

1. Create a free Uber Developer account
2. Create an app in your dashboard
3. Add your redirect URI to the app
4. Enter your credentials below

error.invalid_client_id: Client ID appears to be invalid
error.invalid_client_secret: Client Secret appears to be invalid
